00048 #define CALL_SECTION "[Call]"
00049 
00051 #define COMP_SECTION "[Comp]"

00074 /*
00075  * Deallocate any memory for all the class members and initialize them back to
00076  * null or zero values.
00077  */
00078 void CMSKFileData::Clear()
00079 {
00080         m_strArrayType = "";
00081         m_Indicies.clear();
00082         m_Sets.clear();
00083 }

00087 /*
00088  * Check for the file existance
00089  */
00090 bool CMSKFileData::Exists()
00091 {
00092         // Find the file stats.
00093         struct stat st;
00094         return (stat(m_strFileName.c_str(), &st) == 0);
00095 }

00098 
00099 /*
00100  * Read the file contents.
00101  */
00102 bool CMSKFileData::Read()
00103 {
00104         // Clear any existing data.
00105         Clear();
00106 
00107         // Open the mask file.
00108         ifstream instream(m_strFileName.c_str(), ios::in);
00109         if (!instream)
00110         {
00111                 Clear();
00112                 m_strError = "Unable to open the mask file.";
00113                 return false;
00114         }
00115 
00116         // The first line is the array type
00117         const int LINELENGTH = 1024;
00118         char str[LINELENGTH];
00119         instream.getline(str, LINELENGTH);
00120         m_strArrayType = str;
00121 
00122 
00123         // Search for the call or comp sections.
00124         bool bCallSectionFound = false;
00125         bool bCompSectionFound = false;
00126         while (instream.getline(str, LINELENGTH))
00127         {
00128                 // Skip blank lines.
00129                 if (strlen(str) == 0)
00130                         continue;
00131 
00132                 // If the call section is found then continue with the while loop.
00133                 // Set the flags to start processing lines as from the call section
00134                 // and stop processing lines as from the comp section.
00135                 if (strncmp(str, CALL_SECTION, strlen(CALL_SECTION)) == 0)
00136                 {
00137                         bCallSectionFound = true;
00138                         bCompSectionFound = false;
00139                         continue;
00140                 }
00141 
00142                 // If the comp section is found then continue with the while loop.
00143                 // Set the flags to start processing lines as from the comp section
00144                 // and stop processing lines as from the call section.
00145                 if (strncmp(str, COMP_SECTION, strlen(COMP_SECTION)) == 0)
00146                 {
00147                         bCallSectionFound = false;
00148                         bCompSectionFound = true;
00149                         continue;
00150                 }
00151 
00152                 // Parse the call section line.
00153                 if (bCallSectionFound)
00154                 {
00155                         // Get the probe set name.
00156                         char *token = strtok(str, "\t");
00157                         ProbeSetIndiciesType indicies;
00158                         indicies.probeSetName = token;
00159 
00160                         // Get the mask values.
00161                         char *maskValues = strtok(NULL, "\t");
00162 
00163                         // Loop over all the mask pairs (start-stop).
00164                         char *maskEntry;
00165                         while ((maskEntry = strtok(maskValues, ",")) != NULL)
00166                         {
00167                                 // Extract the first and last index from the token.
00168                                 int first=0;
00169                                 int last=0;
00170                                 if (sscanf(maskEntry, "%d-%d", &first, &last) == 1)
00171                                         last = first;
00172                                 maskValues = NULL;
00173 
00174                                 // The indicies are one based in the mask file. Convert them to zero based
00175                                 // and store them in the list.
00176                                 for (int i=first-1; i<last; i++)
00177                                 {
00178                                         indicies.indicies.push_back(i);
00179                                 }
00180                         }
00181                         m_Indicies.push_back(indicies);
00182                 }
00183 
00184                 else if (bCompSectionFound)
00185                 {
00186                         m_Sets.push_back(strtok(str, "\t"));
00187                 }
00188         }
00189         return true;
00190 }

00194 void CMSKFileData::GetProbeSetIndiciesIterators(ProbeSetIndiciesListConstIt &begin, ProbeSetIndiciesListConstIt &end)
00195 {
00196         begin = m_Indicies.begin();
00197         end = m_Indicies.end();
00198 }
00199 
00201 
00202 void CMSKFileData::GetProbeSetIterators(ProbeSetListConstIt &begin, ProbeSetListConstIt &end)
00203 {
00204         begin = m_Sets.begin();
00205         end = m_Sets.end();
00206 }
